headline: 2 Unstoppable AI Stocks That Just Joined the $1 Trillion Club
summary: Taiwan Semiconductor expects massive growth over the next few years from AI-related chips.  Broadcom's XPUs will challenge Nvidia's GPUs over the next few years.  Two of the latest members to join the club are Taiwan Semiconductor (NYSE: TSM) and Broadcom (NASDAQ: AVGO), although they're not exactly new members.
